meaning_str.bing:
n. 飞行；(乘)坐飞机；指驾驶飞机
adj. 快速的；会飞的；飞行中的；跃起的
v. fly的现在分词
网络. 飞翔；飞扬；飞行的

飞行；(乘)坐飞机；指驾驶飞机
快速的；会飞的；飞行中的；跃起的

飞的；飞行的；能飞的；（因爆炸或抛掷而）飞溅的
飞；飞翔；翱翔；（乘飞行器或航天器）飞行；航行；飘扬；（fly的现在分词）

1.en: we're used to twists and turns like a Slytherin snake, while shocks hit the reader like a muggle seeing a flying car in the sky.
1.cn: 比我们以前曾看过的迂迴曲折的史来哲林巨蛇更为黑暗的阴谋，当震惊打击读者像麻瓜看到天空中的飞车一样。

2.en: She was so much terrified at the thought of flying that she decided to go by train.
2.cn: 她一想到坐飞机就心里害怕，所以就决定坐火车去。

3.en: Flying allows you to quickly return to previous locations to turn in quests, meet up with friends, shop, visit the bank, and more.
3.cn: 飞行可以让你在任务中迅速返回前一个地点，拜访朋友，光顾商店，银行，等等。

0.en: We found them flying too close to humans.
0.cn: 我们发现他们飞得离人类太近。

1.en: Don't worry, Peppa, we're just flying through a cloud. Oooh.
1.cn: 别担心，佩奇，我们正在飞过云层而已。

2.en: Flying high in a plane, up above the clouds and rain. Flying high, sunny sky. Flying higher and higher.
2.cn: 坐在飞机上飞很高，飞到云和雨的上面去。飞很高，天晴天，飞得越来，越高。

3.en: Flying high in a plane, up above the clouds and rain. Flying high, sunny sky. Flying higher and higher.
3.cn: 坐在飞机上飞很高，飞到云和雨的上面去。飞很高，天晴天，飞得越来，越高。

6.en: Flying high, in the sky. Flying higher and higher and higher. I hope it's sunny when we get home.
6.cn: 飞很高，在天上，飞得越来，越高。我希望等我们到家的时候也是天晴天。

7.en: Flying high, in the sky. Flying higher and higher and higher. I hope it's sunny when we get home.
7.cn: 飞很高，在天上，飞得越来，越高。我希望等我们到家的时候也是天晴天。

8.en: In the air, in a chair, snow is falling everywhere. Flying high, in a chair, flying high and high and high.
8.cn: 在天上，在椅子上，雪下得到处都是。飞很高，在椅子上，飞得越来越高。

9.en: You're flying out right now? I'm just gonna finish my beer.
9.cn: 现在，您马上就要飞了？等我喝完我的啤酒。

10.en: If you could fly, what you must do is fly up to her, start flying down at the speed she is falling, hold on to her, then gradually slow down until you come to a complete stop.
10.cn: 假如你会飞，你必须飞上去接住她，然后以她下落的速度往下飞，抱紧她，然后慢慢减速直到完全停住。

11.en: Now, it's sunny. That's because we are on top of the clouds. The plane is flying higher and higher. Oh. Are we flying up to the sun? No. But we are going somewhere sunny.
11.cn: 哇！现在天晴了。这是因为我们在云层的上面。飞机越飞越高了。哦！我们要飞向太阳吗？不！但是我们要去一些一直有太阳的地方。

12.en: Now, it's sunny. That's because we are on top of the clouds. The plane is flying higher and higher. Oh. Are we flying up to the sun? No. But we are going somewhere sunny.
12.cn: 哇！现在天晴了。这是因为我们在云层的上面。飞机越飞越高了。哦！我们要飞向太阳吗？不！但是我们要去一些一直有太阳的地方。

13.en: Last I looked, the only one of those flying around up here was superman.
13.cn: 据我所知，他们唯一一个在这里飞来飞去的，是超人。

14.en: Martha, Martha, Martha. Why, the mother of a flying demon must be a witch.
14.cn: 玛莎，玛莎，玛莎。会飞的恶魔的母亲一定是个女巫。

15.en: He was flying around like he was taunting me, and no one taunts Farkle!
15.cn: 它飞来飞去，像是在嘲笑我抓不住它，谁也不许嘲笑法尔科！

16.en: Raise your hand if you had a flying psycho ninja copier try to kill you today.
16.cn: 要是你今天遇到了一个会飞的变态复印机忍者杀手，请举手。

17.en: The big blue aeroplane is flying very high and very far. It just keeps on going.
17.cn: 这个大大的蓝色飞机非得非常高，非常远。飞机一直在飞呢。

18.en: The big blue aeroplane is flying very high and very far. It just keeps on going.
18.cn: 这个大大的蓝色飞机非得非常高，非常远。飞机一直在飞呢，

19.en: We are flying. What can you see out of the window, Peppa? It's all cloudy and rainy.
19.cn: 我们正在飞。你看窗外有什么，佩奇？外面都是云，还一直下雨。
